page.title: 02THE VILLAGE OF ARNCROACH
page.content: {ARNCROACH}IS A SMALL VILLAGE WHICH HAS WON THE BEST KEPT VILLAGE IN NORTH-EAST FIFE COMPETITION SEVERAL TIMES. THE POPULATION OF THE VILLAGE IS NOW LARGELY AN AGEING ONE WITH VERY FEW FAMILIES WITH YOUNG CHILDREN. {THE VILLAGE SCHOOL WHICH HAS 15 {PUPILS AND 1 TEACHER IS GOING TO BE {CLOSED AFTER THE SUMMER HOLIDAYS.} THE VILLAGE HAS JUST 1 SHOP AND 1 GENERAL STORE. A RECENTLY-INTRODUCED BUS SERVICE PROVIDES COMMUNICATION WITH ST ANDREWS AND LEVEN ON 2 DAYS EACH WEEK. THE ONLY EMPLOYMENT LOCALLY IS ON THE FARMS AND OTHER WORKERS HAVE TO USE THEIR OWN TRANSPORT TO GET TO WORK IN CUPAR, ANSTRUTHER OR ST ANDREWS.
